tool_name: Comprehensive Business Insights for Finnish Companies
tool_description: Woorati API is an exhaustive data solution for anyone looking to obtain comprehensive business data about Finnish companies. This service empowers users to query company data using business ID, domain, or associated personnel. It provides insights into a company's tax debt, financial health, and technology stack, along with exclusive data about government purchases.

api_list.name: Company search
api_list.description: Search for companies using various parameters such as business ID, name, personnel, or website.

optional_parameters.name: qbid
optional_parameters.description: A unique identifier of a business.

optional_parameters.name: qname
optional_parameters.description: A company name or part of it.

optional_parameters.name: qperson
optional_parameters.description: A person who holds a position in a company or part of the name.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page number of results you wish to retrieve, used for pagination.

api_list.name: Company detail
api_list.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific company.
